# VerticalAlignment

Describes how the image should be aligned if it must be cropped or if using repeat fill mode

# VerticalAlignment_1

**Properties**

| Name   | Type | Required | Description |
| :----- | :--- | :------- | :---------- |
| TOP    | str  | ✅       | "top"       |
| CENTER | str  | ✅       | "center"    |
| BOTTOM | str  | ✅       | "bottom"    |
